weHelpYouFindAPet: We help protectionists and shelters put pets up for adoption.
whatIsPetsLove: Pets love is a tool used to publish profiles of pets for adoption and improve the lives of our happy and beloved furry. At the same time, it is a great tool that helps shelters manage them by creating profiles with all the history of our furry animals, capturing the medical history and their life history.
helpToPetMessage: Let's make millions of pets a home.
whatWouldYouLike: What would you like to do?
adoptInformationP1: To find a pet is as simple as using our search engine by entering your address or city where you live and the closest pets will appear.
adoptInformationP2: Once the pet has been chosen, you can contact the shelter or protectionist directly to find out what the next steps would be.
responsibleAdoptionText: When adopting a pet, the protectionist and the adopter will be able to more precisely monitor the main care of the pet. We build a more accurate flow of information with the veterinary data of our friend's health and photographs that will allow us to see a history that seeks to guarantee the safety and health of the same
philosophyText: Pets love was born from the idea that we can all be happy if we have the necessary resources. Pets need us to be able to have a life full of pleasant moments and technology gives us the possibility of building that reality.
